thread.title: Ersan Ilyasova traded to Hawks for Tiago Splitter, per report
thread.title_full: Ersan Ilyasova traded to Hawks for Tiago Splitter, per report

author: Matt Ellentuck (matthew.ellentuck@performgroup.com)
title: Ersan Ilyasova traded to Hawks for Tiago Splitter, per report
text:
February 22, 2017 7:53pm EST February 22, 2017 7:48pm EST The Sixers add Tiago Splitter and two second-round picks in exchange. (Getty Images) 
Updated at 7:53 p.m. ET 
Updated at 7:53 p.m. ET 
The 76ers are sending Ersan Ilyasova to the Hawks for Tiago Splitter and two second-round picks, per the Vertical's Adrian Wojnarowski . 
Wojnarowski reports that the 76ers and Hawks will swap 2017 second-round picks, and Philadelphia will also receive an additional second-round pick from Atlanta (via Miami) in the deal. 
Ilyasova has been solid since he was added to the Sixers roster at the beginning of the season, but it's clear Philadelphia is still in "process" mode. Joel Embiid is still sitting out and Ben Simmons hasn't suited up for Philly this year. 
TRADE DEADLINE: Follow along with all of the NBA's wheeling and dealing 
The 29-year-old Ilyasova isn't fit for the rebuild process, but at 15 points per game on 36 percent 3-point shooting, is a solid floor-stretching pickup for the Hawks. Atlanta didn't give much up for him either. Splitter is playing just 16 minutes per game, scoring six points and pulling down three rebounds. 
Financially, this move doesn't damage either team, as both players are on expiring deals worth similar money. 
But the Sixers were able to stock the cupboard with even more draft picks as the ghost of Sam Hinkie lives on. Watch This
